markdownRemark.html: Located in Casares, at the western end of the Costa del Sol. This beach area for dogs is provided with a trash can and with a whole extension so that your animal can run and jump.

frontmatter.title: Canine beach of Torrox
frontmatter.description: Canine beach of Torrox  - Located in Casares, at the western end of the Costa del Sol. This beach area for dogs is provided with a trash can and with a whole extension so that your animal can run and jump.
